8.title: Easter Basket

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

8.plot: For Easter, Adam Gertler is filling his basket with the season's most inventive and indulgent confections. At Vosges Haut-Chocolat in Chicago, untraditional Easter eggs are served with bacon, and the colorful Enchanted Mushroom blends soft dark chocolate and hazelnut with organic Reishi mushroom before it is decorated by hand. In Alpine, UT, see how the skilled decorators at Kencraft Candy create Panoramic Eggs from pure sugar that last for years. And at Madame Chocolat in Beverly Hills, discover the ultimate Easter bunny -- standing more than three feet tall!

1.title: Weird and Wacky

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

1.plot: Adam Gertler meets a baker who serves nachos with a sugary twist from her truck in New York City. He also visits an ice-cream shop in New Orleans that features some bizarre flavors, like beets and corn, and a taffy factory in Salt Lake City that makes taffy that's inspired by classic cocktails.

2.title: Take the Cake

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

2.plot: Creative cakes are sampled, including deep-fried cupcake sundaes from a sweets shop in Somerville, Mass., and roasted cakes from a German bakery in Chicago. Also: a Hostess factory in Biddeford, Maine, is toured.

3.title: Brain Freeze

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

3.plot: Cold confections are featured. Included: New Orleans snowballs; Dippin' Dots ice cream.

5.title: Eye Candy

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

5.plot: Adam Gertler is searching for artistically inspired desserts that are as visually stunning as they are delicious. Visit the Peeps & Company store in Oxon Hill, Maryland, where a local artist is creating tasty, candy art using the classic marshmallow confections. Go apple picking in La Verne, California, at a shop that specializes in hand-painting colorful caramel apples, transforming them into beautiful works of art. And discover a bakery in Chicago where the radically colorful cakes look like they were decorated in a tattoo parlor.

6.title: Blissfully Sweet

episode of.title: Kid in a Candy Store (TV Series 2010– )

6.plot: Adam Gertler tastes the most deliciously decadent desserts being made today. Discover a sweets bar in Houston that will dip just about anything in chocolate - including corn chips! Visit a restaurant in Washington D.C. serving a three-course gourmet dessert menu made with your favorite childhood candies. Take a ride on an eclectic dessert truck in Los Angeles that is serving up architecturally inspired ice cream sandwiches made with fresh baked cookies and exotic ice creams. And check out a bake stand in Philly's Reading Terminal Market that packs everything in their ...

imdb.plot outline: Join Adam Gertler, the epitome of a big kid in a candy store, as he travels coast to coast and proves that some of the coolest, quirkiest and tastiest treats come from the world of sweets. In this six-episode series, he'll introduce us to the people and places creating whimsical confections and desserts to satisfy your sweet tooth. From wild and wacky twists on traditional favorites, like deep-fried cupcakes or sweet beet ice cream, to the most scrumptious and creative candy, cakes and frozen snacks in the country, this sweet joyride will make you feel like a kid again.
imdb.title: Kid in a Candy Store
